name: Don't open me
description:
Don't open me... Really don't...
Why would you do this anyway ?
You don't care about my feelings and I don't care about yours.
I know who you are...

"Don't open me" is the first game of the Me.exe series, you can play the sequel "Open me" if you liked the first one!

Open me: https://mr-koroshiya.itch.io/openme
